rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with Vastu-optimized east direction orientation. Features a minimalistic Scandinavian design.
Open space featuring modern Scandinavian furniture and ample natural light from north-facing windows. Vastu guidelines ensure positive energy flow.
Adjacent to the living room; designed with a functional Scandinavian aesthetic and comfortable seating arrangement, incorporating wheelchair access.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with ergonomic layout for wheelchair accessibility. Adheres to Vastu by placing the stove in a favorable direction.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom featuring Scandinavian minimalist design and fixtures optimized for ease of use. Vastu principles ensure proper placement.
Located on the ground floor to accommodate accessibility. Features ample natural light, Scandinavian interiors, and private ensuite bathroom.
Wheelchair-accessible gym area with modern equipment and a Scandinavian aesthetic. Vastu guidelines ensure the roomâ€™s energy is optimized.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible entrance with automatic door system ensuring ease of movement and adherence to Vastu principles by aligning with the east.
Large windows to maximize natural light; designed for Scandinavian minimalism while following Vastu guidelines.
Accessible staircase leading to the rooftop terrace; designed with safety and ease of access in mind for all family members including wheelchair users.

rooms.description: Scandinavian style bedroom optimized for privacy and accessibility, including a wheelchair-friendly layout.
Wheelchair accessible bedroom with natural light and modern Scandinavian decor; adheres to Vastu for optimal energy flow.
Child-friendly Scandinavian bedroom designed for safety and ease of access; follows Vastu principles in its layout.
Large open terrace with panoramic views and seating arrangements. Designed for relaxation and entertainment while adhering to Scandinavian minimalism and Vastu principles.
Space allocated for additional storage and maintenance facilities; designed with accessibility in mind.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible balcony door for Bedroom 2 ensuring natural light and fresh air.
Staircase connecting first floor to ground floor with safety handrails designed for ease of access including wheelchair users.

rooms.description: Expansive garden terrace on the roof featuring landscaped areas, seating and a jogging path. Scandinavian design with Vastu-aligned layout.

openings.description: Secure and accessible door leading to the rooftop terrace ensuring compliance with wheelchair accessibility guidelines.
